info.title: Infoblox NOTIFICATION API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI NOTIFICATION objects

get.description: Returns a list of notification:rest:endpoint objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific notification:rest:endpoint object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific notification:rest:endpoint object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific notification:rest:endpoint object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of notification:rest:template objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific notification:rest:template object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific notification:rest:template object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific notification:rest:template object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of notification:rule objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific notification:rule object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific notification:rule object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific notification:rule object by reference

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

Method.name: _method
Method.description: Enter the method type for the request

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

client_certificate_subject.description: The client certificate subject of a notification REST endpoint.

client_certificate_token.description: The token returned by the uploadinit function call in object fileop for a notification REST endpoit client certificate.

client_certificate_valid_from.description: The timestamp when client certificate for a notification REST endpoint was created.

client_certificate_valid_to.description: The timestamp when client certificate for a notification REST endpoint expires.

comment.description: The comment of a notification REST endpoint.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

log_level.description: The log level for a notification REST endpoint.

name.description: The name of a notification REST endpoint.

outbound_member_type.description: The outbound member which will generate an event.

outbound_members.description: The list of members for outbound events.

password.description: The password of the user that can log into a notification REST endpoint.

sync_disabled.description: Determines if the sync process is disabled for a notification REST endpoint.

timeout.description: The timeout of session management (in seconds).

uri.description: The URI of a notification REST endpoint.

username.description: The username of the user that can log into a notification REST endpoint.

wapi_user_name.description: The user name for WAPI integration.

wapi_user_password.description: The user password for WAPI integration.

template.description: The name of the REST API template parameter.

name.description: The name of the REST API template parameter.

value.description: The value of the REST API template parameter.

default_value.description: The default value of the REST API template parameter.

syntax.description: The syntax of the REST API template parameter.

added_on.description: The time stamp when a template was added.

comment.description: The comment for this REST API template.

content.description: The JSON formatted content of a template. The data passed by content creates parameters for a template.

name.description: The name of a notification REST template.

outbound_type.description: The outbound type for the template.

name.description: The name of the REST API template parameter.

value.description: The value of the REST API template parameter.

default_value.description: The default value of the REST API template parameter.

syntax.description: The syntax of the REST API template parameter.

oneOf.description: The response format to retrieve __NotificationRestTemplate__ objects.
oneOf.title: ListNotificationRestTemplateResponseObject

all_members.description: Determines whether the notification rule is applied on all members or not. When this is set to False, the notification rule is applied only on selected_members.

disable.description: Determines whether a notification rule is disabled or not. When this is set to False, the notification rule is enabled.

enable_event_deduplication.description: Determines whether the notification rule for event deduplication is enabled. Note that to enable event deduplication, you must set at least one deduplication field.

enable_event_deduplication_log.description: Determines whether the notification rule for the event deduplication syslog is enabled.

event_deduplication_fields.description: The list of fields that must be used in the notification rule for event deduplication.

event_deduplication_lookback_period.description: The lookback period for the notification rule for event deduplication.

notification_action.description: The notification rule action is applied if expression list evaluates to True.

selected_members.description: The list of the members on which the notification rule is applied.

enabled_attributes.description: The list of NIOS extensible attributes enalbed for publishsing to Cisco ISE endpoint.

weekdays.description: Days of the week when scheduling is triggered.

time_zone.description: The time zone for the schedule.

recurring_time.description: The recurring time for the schedule in Epoch seconds format. This field is obsolete and is preserved only for backward compatibility purposes. Please use other applicable fields to define the recurring schedule. DO NOT use recurring_time together with these fields. If you use recurring_time with other fields to define the recurring schedule, recurring_time has priority over year, hour_of_day, and minutes_past_hour and will override the values of these fields, although it does not override month and day_of_month. In this case, the recurring time value might be different than the intended value that you define.

frequency.description: The frequency for the scheduled task.

every.description: The number of frequency to wait before repeating the scheduled task.

minutes_past_hour.description: The minutes past the hour for the scheduled task.

hour_of_day.description: The hour of day for the scheduled task.

year.description: The year for the scheduled task.

month.description: The month for the scheduled task.

day_of_month.description: The day of the month for the scheduled task.

repeat.description: Indicates if the scheduled task will be repeated or run only once.

disable.description: If set to True, the scheduled task is disabled.

template.description: The name of the REST API template parameter.

name.description: The name of the REST API template parameter.

value.description: The value of the REST API template parameter.

default_value.description: The default value of the REST API template parameter.

syntax.description: The syntax of the REST API template parameter.
